00045 enum AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::InfoFilter
00046 AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::stringToFilter(const std::string& filter) {
00047   if(filter=="none") {
00048     return NoFilter;
00049   }
00050   else if(filter=="bic") {
00051     return BIC;
00052   }
00053   else if(filter=="aic") {
00054     return AIC;
00055   }
00056   //
00057   Err::errAbort("Don't recognize InfoFilter of type: '" + ToStr(filter) + "'");
00058   return NoFilter; // for compiler...
00059 }

00061   /** Constructor. */
00062 AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel(bool doLog,
00063                                                  bool doCorr,
00064                                                  bool doDebug,
00065                                                  const std::string &infoFilter,
00066                                                  int hardMin, double minProportion, bool qnormOnly)
00067   : AnalysisStreamExpression()
00068 {
00069   setupSelfDoc(*this);
00070   m_DoLog = doLog;
00071   m_DoCorrelation = doCorr;
00072   m_Debug = doDebug;
00073   m_HardMinimum = hardMin;
00074   m_HardProportion = minProportion;
00075   m_InfoFilter = AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::stringToFilter(infoFilter.c_str());
00076   m_QuantNormOnly = qnormOnly;
00077   m_QNorm = NULL;
00078   setOptValue("log", m_DoLog);
00079   setOptValue("corr", m_DoCorrelation);
00080   setOptValue("debug", m_Debug);
00081   setOptValue("info-criterion", infoFilter);
00082   setOptValue("min-percent", ToStr(m_HardProportion));
00083   setOptValue("hard-min", ToStr(m_HardMinimum));
00084   setOptValue("qnorm-only", ToStr(m_QuantNormOnly));
00085 }

00087 AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::~AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel() {
00088   Fs::carefulClose(m_Log);
00089   delete m_QNorm;
00090 }

00092 void AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::setQuantNorm(SketchQuantNormTran *qnorm) {
00093   m_QNorm = qnorm;
00094 }

00096 void AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::registerChipStreamObjs(IntensityReader &reader) {
00097   if(getChipStreamHead() != NULL)
00098     reader.registerStream(getChipStreamHead());
00099   if(m_QuantNormOnly) {
00100     if(m_QNorm == NULL) {
00101       Err::errAbort("AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::registerChipStreamObjs() - Can't have NULL SketchQuantNormTran and set m_QuantNormOnly");
00102     }
00103     reader.registerStream(m_QNorm);
00104   }
00105 }
00106 
00107 void AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::fillInPmData(Matrix &mat,
00108                                            std::vector<probeid_t> &probeIds,
00109                                            ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00110                                            std::vector<ChipStream *> &cStream,
00111                                            IntensityMart &iMart,
00112                                            bool doLog) {
00113   unsigned int psIx = 0;
00114   unsigned int atomPmCount = 0;
00115   unsigned int chipCount = iMart.getCelFileCount();
00116   /* Loop through and fill in the data as coming from the intensity mart. */
00117   for(psIx = 0; psIx < psGroup.probeSets.size(); psIx++) {
00118     const ProbeSet *ps = psGroup.probeSets[psIx];
00119     if(ps == NULL)
00120       continue;
00121     for(uint32_t atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00122       Atom &atom = *(ps->atoms[atomIx]);
00123       unsigned int channelIx = atom.getChannelCode();
00124       for(uint32_t probeIx = 0; probeIx < atom.probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00125         Probe *p = atom.probes[probeIx];
00126         if(p->type == Probe::PMST || p->type == Probe::PMAT) {
00127           probeid_t probeId = p->id;
00128           probeIds[atomPmCount] = p->id;
00129           for(uint32_t chipIx = 0; chipIx < chipCount; chipIx++) {
00130             /* PM transformation. */
00131             double intensity = QuantMethod::transformPrimaryData(probeId, chipIx, iMart, cStream, channelIx);
00132             ///@todo update mat to handle multi channel expression probesets
00133             mat.element(atomPmCount, chipIx) = intensity;
00134           }
00135           atomPmCount++;
00136         }
00137       }
00138     } /* atoms. */
00139   } /* probe sets. */
00140 }

00178 //   int maxIterations = 50;
00179 //   int i = 0;
00180 //   if(M.Ncols() != M.Nrows())
00181 //     Err::errAbort("MaxEigen() - Can't get eigen values of non square matrices.");
00182 //   if(M.Ncols() <= 0)

00186 //   V = V / Norm1(V);
00187 //   for(i = 0; i < maxIterations; i++) {
00188 //     //    MaxVec = M * V;
00189 //     SpectClust::multByMatrix(MaxVec, V, M);
00190 //     // cout << "MaxVec: " << endl << MaxVec << endl;
00191 //     double norm = sqrt(SumSquare(MaxVec));
00192 //     MaxVec = MaxVec / norm; // scale so we don't get too big.
00193 //     // cout << "Norm: " << norm << endl;
00194 //     // cout << "Normed MaxVec: " << endl << MaxVec << endl;
00195 //     double delta = SumAbsoluteValue(MaxVec - V);
00196 //     if(delta < maxDelta)
00197 //       break; // we've already converged to eigen vector.
00198 //     V = MaxVec;
00199 //   }
00200 //   // calculate approximate max eigen value using Rayleigh quotient (x'*M*x/x'*x).
00201 //   Matrix num = (MaxVec.t() * M * MaxVec);
00202 //   Matrix denom =  (MaxVec.t() * MaxVec);
00203 //   maxValue = num.element(0,0) / denom.element(0,0);

00206 
00207 void AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::doFeatureSelection(ColumnVector &W, std::set<probeid_t> &goodIds,
00208                                                  Matrix &PM, std::vector<probeid_t> &probeIds,
00209                                                  bool doCorr, std::ofstream *out, const char *psName) {
00210   double mEigVal = 0; // Maximum eigen value
00211   int atomPmCount = PM.Ncols();
00212   Matrix Cov(atomPmCount, atomPmCount);
00213   if(doCorr) {
00214     SpectClust::MatrixCor(PM, Cov);
00215   }
00216   else {
00217     SpectClust::MatrixScatter(PM, Cov);
00218   }
00219   ColumnVector mEig(atomPmCount); // Max eigen vector.
00220   try {
00221     SpectClust::MaxEigen(Cov, mEigVal, mEig, 50);
00222     // If eigenvector is negative overall make it positive.
00223     Matrix ToSum = Cov * mEig; // Why can't we just sum the vector
00224                                // itself? If it is really an
00225                                // eigenvector, should just be a constant
00226                                // times sum and not change sign
00227     if(ToSum.Sum() < 0) {
00228       mEig = mEig * -1;
00229     }
00230   }
00231   catch(BaseException &e) {
00232     Err::errAbort("Newmat Err: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00233   }
00234   catch(...) {
00235     Err::errAbort("Unknown newmat Error.");
00236   }
00237 
00238   // Set negative weights to zero.
00239   for(int i = 0; i < mEig.Nrows(); i++) {
00240     mEig.element(i) = Max((double)mEig.element(i), 0.0);
00241   }
00242   // Divide all weights by the norm of the vector.
00243   mEig = mEig / sqrt(mEig.SumSquare());
00244 
00245   // Use each component of the eigenvector as the weight for a particular probe.
00246   W = mEig;
00247   for(int i = 0; i < W.Nrows(); i++) {
00248     W.element(i) = W.element(i) * W.element(i);
00249   }
00250   vector<double> weights(atomPmCount);
00251   for(int i = 0; i < W.Nrows(); i++) {
00252     weights[i] = W.element(i);
00253   }
00254   if(out != NULL && out->is_open()) {
00255     for(int i = 0; i < weights.size(); i++) {
00256       (*out) << psName << "\t" << probeIds[i] << "\t" << weights[i] << endl;
00257     }
00258   }
00259   // Find the minimum weight to allow, want to grab the first N percent.
00260   sort(weights.begin(), weights.end());
00261   vector<double>::reverse_iterator iter;
00262   double sum = 0;
00263   double minVal = 1; // can't be any smaller than 1.
00264   for(iter = weights.rbegin(); iter != weights.rend(); ++iter) {
00265     sum += *iter;
00266     minVal = *iter;
00267     if(sum >= .9)  // get 90% of the weights, then leave the rest.
00268       break;
00269   }
00270   // mark probes to use as those that are above our minimum weight.
00271   for(int i = 0; i < W.Nrows(); i++) {
00272     if(W.element(i) >= minVal) {
00273       goodIds.insert(probeIds[i]);
00274     }
00275   }
00276 }
00277 
00278 void AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::log2Matrix(Matrix &M) {
00279   static const double minVal = DBL_MIN;
00280   for(int i = 0; i < M.Nrows(); i++) {
00281     for(int j = 0; j < M.Ncols(); j++) {
00282       if(M.element(i,j) < 0) {
00283         Err::errAbort("log2Matrix() - Can't take log2 of negative values.");
00284       }
00285       M.element(i,j) = log2(Max(minVal, (double)M.element(i,j)));
00286     }
00287   }
00288 }
00289 
00290 bool AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::fillInSelectProbes(ProbeSetGroup &selectGroup, 
00291                                                  std::vector<ChipStream *> &cStream, 
00292                                                  IntensityMart &iMart, 
00293                                                  ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00294                                                  std::vector<double> &confVals) {
00295   int chipCount = iMart.getCelDataSetCount();
00296   int atomPmCount = psGroup.countPmProbes();
00297   int newAtomPmCount = atomPmCount;
00298   bool success = true;
00299   if(atomPmCount < m_HardMinimum) {
00300     success = false;
00301   }
00302   else {
00303     vector<bool> probesToUse(atomPmCount, false);
00304     vector<probeid_t> probeIds(atomPmCount, -1); // Probe ids in order as they are in psGroup
00305     set<probeid_t> goodIds;
00306     Matrix PM(atomPmCount, chipCount); // rows are probes, columns are chips
00307     fillInPmData(PM, probeIds, psGroup, cStream, iMart, m_DoLog);
00308     Matrix InfoM;
00309     if(m_InfoFilter != NoFilter) {
00310       InfoM = PM;
00311     }
00312     if(m_DoLog) {
00313       log2Matrix(PM);
00314     }
00315     //  cout << endl << "Original: " << psGroup.name << endl << PM << endl;
00316     PM = PM.t();
00317     ColumnVector W;
00318     string tempName;
00319     tempName = psGroup.name;
00320     doFeatureSelection(W, goodIds, PM, probeIds, m_DoCorrelation, &m_ProbeWeights, tempName.c_str());
00321     bool infoGood = true;
00322     vector<double> aicVals(2, 0);
00323     vector<double> bicVals(2, 0);
00324     // if we're deciding whether or not to do feature selection based
00325     // on information critera do so here.
00326     if(m_InfoFilter != NoFilter) {
00327       vector<int> clusters(probeIds.size(), 1);
00328       for(int i = 0; i < probeIds.size(); i++) {
00329         if(goodIds.find(probeIds[i]) != goodIds.end()) {
00330           clusters[i] = 0;
00331         }
00332       }
00333       vector<double> aicVals, bicVals;
00334       SpectClust::AICcRmaMedianCluster(InfoM, 2, clusters, aicVals, bicVals, true);
00335       //      SpectClust::AICcMedianCluster(M, 2, clusters, aicVals, bicVals);
00336       if(m_InfoFilter == AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::BIC)
00337         confVals = bicVals;
00338       else if(m_InfoFilter == AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::AIC)
00339         confVals = aicVals;
00340       else
00341         Err::errAbort("AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::doFeatureSelection() - Don't recognize info filter: '" + ToStr(m_InfoFilter) + "'");
00342       if(confVals[0] <= confVals[1]) {
00343         infoGood = false;
00344       }
00345     }
00346     double percent = (double) goodIds.size() / atomPmCount;
00347     if(goodIds.size() < m_HardMinimum || percent < m_HardProportion) {
00348       fill(confVals.begin(), confVals.end(), 0);
00349     }
00350     if(goodIds.size() >= m_HardMinimum && infoGood) {
00351       makeSelectProbesetGroup(selectGroup, goodIds, psGroup);
00352       newAtomPmCount = selectGroup.countPmProbes();
00353     }
00354     else {
00355       success = false;
00356     }
00357   }
00358   return success;
00359 }
00360 
00361  /**
00362  * Do the analysis for a particular group of probe sets.
00363  *
00364  * @param psGroup - Collection of probe sets to get probes from.
00365  * @param layout - How probes/probesets are laid out on chip.
00366  * @param iMart - Object containing raw data values for all chips.
00367  * @param doReport - Should the quantification report object be called?
00368  * @param alleleSummaryOnly - this is a parameter that makes sense in the base class AnalysisStream::doAnalysis, but not here.  Included here only to make the inheritance work.  Feel free to ignore.
00369  *
00370  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00371  */
00372 bool AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::doAnalysis(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00373                                          IntensityMart &iMart, bool doReport, bool alleleSummaryOnly) {
00374   if(m_Debug && !m_AllProbes.is_open()) {
00375     /// @todo use TsvFile
00376     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_AllProbes, Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".pca-select.data.txt"));
00377     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_UsedProbes,Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".pca-select.useddata.txt"));
00378     m_AllProbes << "probeset\tprobe";
00379     m_UsedProbes << "probeset\tprobe";
00380 
00381     std::vector<std::string> celFiles = iMart.getCelFileNames();
00382     for(int i = 0; i < celFiles.size(); i++) {
00383       m_AllProbes << "\t" << celFiles[i];
00384       m_UsedProbes << "\t" << celFiles[i];
00385     }
00386     m_AllProbes << endl;
00387     m_UsedProbes << endl;
00388 
00389     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_ProbeWeights,Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".pca-select.weights.txt"));
00390     m_ProbeWeights << "probeset\tprobe\tweight" << endl;
00391   }
00392   if(!m_Log.is_open()) {
00393     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_Log,Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".pca-select.report.txt"));
00394     m_Log << "probeset_id\ttotal\tused\torig_probes\tused_probes" << endl;
00395   }
00396   bool success = true;
00397   ProbeSetGroup psSelectGroup, *toUse = NULL;
00398   vector<double> confVals(2,0);
00399   // Use different chipstream vector if we're using our own normalization...
00400   vector<ChipStream *> selfQNorm(1);
00401   vector<ChipStream *> *stream = NULL;
00402   if(m_QuantNormOnly) {
00403     if(m_QNorm == NULL) {
00404       Err::errAbort("AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::doAnalysis() - Can't have NULL SketchQuantNormTran and set m_QuantNormOnly");
00405     }
00406     selfQNorm[0] = m_QNorm;
00407     stream = &selfQNorm;
00408   }
00409   else {
00410     stream = &m_CStreams;
00411   }
00412   // Do the actual selection
00413   if(fillInSelectProbes(psSelectGroup, *stream, iMart, psGroup, confVals)) {
00414     toUse = &psSelectGroup;
00415   }
00416   else {
00417     toUse = &psGroup;
00418   }
00419   if(m_Log.is_open()) {
00420     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::reportProbesUsed(m_Log, *toUse, psGroup, confVals);
00421   }
00422   if(m_AllProbes.is_open()) {
00423     reportProbeLevelData(m_AllProbes, psGroup, iMart, *stream);
00424     reportProbeLevelData(m_UsedProbes, *toUse, iMart, *stream);
00425   }
00426   if(m_QMethod->setUp(*toUse, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust)) {
00427     m_QMethod->computeEstimate();
00428     if(doReport) {
00429       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00430         m_Reporters[i]->report(*toUse, *m_QMethod, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust);
00431       }
00432     }
00433   }
00434   else {
00435     Verbose::out(5, "Warning setup failed for name: " + ToStr(toUse->name));
00436     success = false;
00437   }
00438   if(!success && doReport) {
00439     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00440       m_Reporters[i]->reportFailure(*toUse, *m_QMethod, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust);
00441     }
00442   }
00443   return success;
00444 }
00445 
00446 void
00447 AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::reportProbeLevelData(std::ofstream &out,
00448                                               ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00449                                               IntensityMart &iMart,
00450                                               std::vector<ChipStream *> &cStream) {
00451   std::string name;
00452   name = psGroup.name;
00453   for(int psIx = 0; psIx < psGroup.probeSets.size(); psIx++) {
00454     ProbeSet *ps = psGroup.probeSets[psIx];
00455     for(int atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00456       Atom *a = ps->atoms[atomIx];
00457       unsigned int channelIx = a->getChannelCode();
00458       for(int probeIx = 0; probeIx < a->probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00459         Probe *p = a->probes[probeIx];
00460         if(name != "") {
00461           out << name << "\t";
00462         }
00463         else {
00464           out << ps->name << "\t";
00465         }
00466         out << p->id;
00467 
00468         for(int chipIx = 0; chipIx < iMart.getCelFileCount(); chipIx++) {
00469           double intensity = QuantMethod::transformPrimaryData(p->id, chipIx, iMart, cStream, channelIx);
00470           out << "\t" << intensity;
00471         }
00472         out << endl;
00473       }
00474     }
00475   }
00476 }
00477 
00478 void AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::reportProbesUsed(std::ofstream &out,
00479                                                ProbeSetGroup &used,
00480                                                ProbeSetGroup &orig,
00481                                                std::vector<double> &confVals) {
00482   int atomPmCount = orig.countPmProbes();
00483   int newAtomPmCount = used.countPmProbes();
00484   out << used.name;
00485   out << "\t" << atomPmCount << "\t" << newAtomPmCount;
00486   vector<probeid_t> usedIds;
00487   vector<probeid_t> origIds;
00488 //   if(confVals.size() != 0) {
00489 //     for(int i = 0; i < confVals.size(); i++) {
00490 //       out << "\t" << confVals[i];
00491 //     }
00492 //   }
00493   for(int psIx = 0; psIx < used.probeSets.size(); psIx++) {
00494     ProbeSet *ps = used.probeSets[psIx];
00495     for(int atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00496       Atom *a = ps->atoms[atomIx];
00497       for(int probeIx = 0; probeIx < a->probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00498         Probe *p = a->probes[probeIx];
00499         usedIds.push_back(p->id);
00500       }
00501     }
00502   }
00503   for(int psIx = 0; psIx < orig.probeSets.size(); psIx++) {
00504     ProbeSet *ps = orig.probeSets[psIx];
00505     for(int atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00506       Atom *a = ps->atoms[atomIx];
00507       for(int probeIx = 0; probeIx < a->probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00508         Probe *p = a->probes[probeIx];
00509         origIds.push_back(p->id);
00510       }
00511     }
00512   }
00513   std::sort(usedIds.begin(), usedIds.end());
00514   std::sort(origIds.begin(), origIds.end());
00515   out << "\t";
00516   for(int i = 0; i < origIds.size(); i++) {
00517     out << FROM_ZEROBASED(origIds[i]) << ",";
00518   }
00519   out << "\t";
00520   for(int i = 0; i < usedIds.size(); i++) {
00521     out << FROM_ZEROBASED(usedIds[i]) << ",";
00522   }
00523   out << endl;
00524 }
